title: Plant
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Vegan restaurant offering breakfast such as power oatmeal and tofu scramble wrap; lunch burger, wrap, and a buddha box of tofu with miso peanut dressing served with brown rice and greens; plus desserts, smoothies, cold pressed juices, beer and wine. Sells its own retail line of vegan mayo, cheese, tempeh bacon, and marshmallow. Opened Feb 2014 previously at The Urban Hub on Buitengracht St.
